剕字的基本解释

剕
fèi
古代把脚砍掉的酷刑：剕刑。

剕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《集韻》父沸切，去未，奉。］
断足。古代五刑之一。

剕字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剕； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页141第02
【唐韻】扶沸切【集韻】父沸切，?肥去聲。【玉篇】刖也。【廣韻】刖足也。【前漢·百官公卿表】咎繇作士，正五?。【註】師古曰：剕，去?骨也。

Cut
Basic explanation of words
Cut
fèi
The ancient torture of cutting off the feet: erosive torture.
Cut
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèi］
["Jiyun" father is boiling and cutting, Quwei, Feng. ]
Broken foot. One of the ancient five punishments.
Cut
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Knife word department] 　剕; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 141 02
[Tang Yun] Help boil and cut [Jiyun] Father boils and cut, fat goes to sound. [Jade articles] 刖 also. [Guang Yun] Sweeping feet too. 【Former Han·Baiguan Gongqing Formation】Zhiyou is a scholar, positive five? [Note] Shi Gu said: 剕, go to the bone.
